text: Mystic Pizza is a 1988 American romantic comedy-drama movie. It stars Annabeth Gish and Julia Roberts. The movie is about teenage girls who work in a pizza parlor in Connecticut. The movie received very positive reviews and has become a cult classic. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1988 comedy- drama movies Category:1988 romance movies Category:1988 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:1980s teen romance movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Connecticut Category:Movies directed by Donald Petrie
title: Mystic Pizza
